sentences: Viimased uudised on omane vahel kaasa kõnealune teema.
Ta jättis viimased sõnad muljele, et teda pidades ei saa midagi täna öelda.
Kui nad laskusid koju, olid seejärel viimased inimesed, kellega nad suhtlesid.
context: The word 'viimased' is used to describe something that comes at the end of a series or sequence. It can mean 'latest', as in the most recent updates; 'last', such as final words before an event; and 'final', referring to the concluding part of something.
